document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Europe, Caucasus, Asia Minor , Levant, Iran , Kazakhstan , Siberia, Russian Far East, North Africa ( Alonso-Zarazaga 2011a ).

Biology. Xerothermic grasslands. Adults occur in IV–X ( Dieckmann 1977 ). On Asteraceae :
Carduus acanthoides
( Dieckmann 1977 ; Alonso-Zarazaga 1991 ; Wanat 1995 );
Cynara scolymus ( Dieckmann 1977 )
;
Carduus crispus
,
C. nutans
,
C. pycnocephalus
,
Centaurea diffusa
,
C. jacea
,
C. solstitialis
,
Cirsium arvense
,
C. vulgare
,
Picnomon acarna
,
Silybum marianum
( Alonso-Zarazaga 1991 ; Wanat 1995 ).
